sourceDesc.p: TEI metadata for a 1991 press article reviewing a performance of Capitano Ulisse. Article: « Capitano Ulisse », by Jean Cléo Godin, in Jeu, issue 58 (1991), p. 201. Online record: Érudit. Local file: Article1991.pdf. Director: Mario Missoli.

div.head: Press article
div.p: This object records a critical review published in 1991 concerning the Montréal presentation of Capitano Ulisse by the Teatro Stabile di Palermo, a production originally created in 1990. As a performance-related document, the article provides evidence of the staging’s reception and critical interpretation, contributing to the reconstruction of its performative history.
